replace:
<xf:option 
    name="user_criteria[syl_userpets_duel_wins_at_least][rule]" 
    value="syl_userpets_duel_wins_at_least" 
    selected="{$criteria.syl_userpets_duel_wins_at_least}" 
    label="{{ phrase('syl_userpets_duel_wins_at_least') }}"
>
    <xf:numberbox 
        name="user_criteria[syl_userpets_duel_wins_at_least][data][count]" 
        value="{$criteria.syl_userpets_duel_wins_at_least.count}" 
        min="0" 
        step="1" 
        size="5" 
    />
</xf:option>

<xf:option 
    name="user_criteria[syl_userpets_duel_losses_at_least][rule]" 
    value="syl_userpets_duel_losses_at_least" 
    selected="{$criteria.syl_userpets_duel_losses_at_least}" 
    label="{{ phrase('syl_userpets_duel_losses_at_least') }}"
>
    <xf:numberbox 
        name="user_criteria[syl_userpets_duel_losses_at_least][data][count]" 
        value="{$criteria.syl_userpets_duel_losses_at_least.count}" 
        min="0" 
        step="1" 
        size="5" 
    />
</xf:option>

<xf:option 
    name="user_criteria[syl_userpets_pet_level_at_least][rule]" 
    value="syl_userpets_pet_level_at_least" 
    selected="{$criteria.syl_userpets_pet_level_at_least}" 
    label="{{ phrase('syl_userpets_pet_level_at_least') }}"
>
    <xf:numberbox 
        name="user_criteria[syl_userpets_pet_level_at_least][data][level]" 
        value="{$criteria.syl_userpets_pet_level_at_least.level}" 
        min="1" 
        step="1" 
        size="5" 
    />
</xf:option>
